/- Lemma
If $P$ is a logical stament and $p$ is a proof of $P$ then $P$ is true.
-/
lemma Goldbach (n : ℕ) (hn : even n) : ∃ (p q : ℕ) (hp : prime p) (hq : prime q), n = p + q :=
begin
